title: (24010) León - Calle Cronista Luis Pastrana
description: Always empty parking lot Large north of the city by the Bernesga river.

title: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 290D CL-623
description: Parking for vehicles very clean and quiet located next to restaurant, with picnic area and playground. Only parking without services. A few km from León

title: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 10 Calle Cartago
title_short: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 10 Calle Cartago
description: Apartment next to a shopping center, quiet place to spend the night free and without noise.

title: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 85 Avenida el Romeral
title_short: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 85 Avenida el Romeral
description: It's just over. Avda. Romeral, 85 of San Andrés de Rabanedo (León). Next to the San Andrés pool. The area has 8 easily accessible parking spaces.

title: (24008) León - 24D Avenida de los Reyes Leoneses
title_short: (24008) León - 24D Avenida de los Reyes Leoneses
description: Large parking in the battery, next to a large park, ideal for children to play and walk our dogs. The places attached to the park are the best because they have more space without overgrown the sidewalk, our camper has a size of 5'95 and it was perfect. It's a bit far from the center (20 minutes walk), but there is a bus stop right next door. We spent two nights over the weekend and it was very quiet. There are supermarkets and cafes in the vicinity

title: (24193) Villaquilambre - 8 Calle Rey Sancho
description: Large empty parking area in a quiet development area. Have spent a quiet night here. A bit urban for nature lovers but well located for a night in transit. No service installations or similar.

title: (24010) León - 5 Calle Truchillas
description: NEW LAUNDRY, WITH GREAT CAPACITY MACHINES AND VERY GOOD CLEANING PRODUCTS. We were delighted, the owner was there and very kindly explained everything to us.

title: (24193) Villaquilambre - 309 Carretera Asturias
description: Gasolinera Alto León sells Cepsa gas cylinders. You can easily conclude the contract on site if you don't have a bottle to swap yet.

title: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 6-101 Calle los Picones
title_short: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 6-101 Calle los Picones
description: ISLA LEON, the enclosure and the parking lot do not give much confidence because of what it looks like, something that has been neglected for my taste, but inside, everything is fine without much luxury, but well . !! ADVICE !! Ideal to spend 1 day of swimming with toboggans. Pools, barbecues.

title: (24008) León - Avenida de Peregrinos.
description: Parking for Caravans 48hrs free. but no Toilettes, Showers, no Washing machine. OK for parking only

title: (24008) León - 9 Avenida de los Reyes Leoneses
title_short: (24008) León - 9 Avenida de los Reyes Leoneses
description: Nearby laundry service.

title: (24008) León - 1 Avenida los Peregrinos
description: Very close to a free motorhome area, next to the Junta de Castilla y Leon and Parador de San Marcos. Parking central but quiet at night. Not recommended for large ACs. the cost from 20:00 to 9:00 is free!

title: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 123 Lugar Trobajo Camino
title_short: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 123 Lugar Trobajo Camino
description: Quiet park on the outskirts. It is reached from Trobajo del Camino by 600m of a dirt path. At 1.5 km from the Islaleon water park, we went with a bicycle along roads and some part through secondary streets. There is also a delicious bakery nearby, the Velilla bakery, on a street parallel to the soccer field. At night there was a dog barking, but we had no problem. there is quite a lot of shade. there are also some picnic tables and some swings but they are poorly maintained

title: (24007) León - 6 2a Travesía de Joaquín González Vecín
title_short: (24007) León - 6 2a Travesía de Joaquín González Vecín
description:
Laundry. Cash only but has a change machine.
Lots of parking for vans in area.

title: (24007) León - Avenida de la Universidad
description: One of the most perfect camper parking areas with all necessary amenities. There are 2 emptying and filling points. One at each end of the motorhome parking spaces. A 15 minute walk into the centre of the City.

title: (24007) León - 17 Avenida Emilio Hurtado
description: Quiet place to sleep the night or leave the car quietly

title: (24007) León - 25D Calle González de Lama
description: It is at the back of the Cathedral of León at about 100 meters. We found a quiet place to be in the middle of the city. In the green parking area there is a sign where the stray dogs are allowed. Ideal to stop to eat in Leon, to know the city and to leave early the following day

title: (24007) León - 131 Calle de la Serna
description: Large easily accessible parking. Some squares have a small incline. It is a free zone and without an overnight stay. We slept with two other motorhomes because the areas for that purpose are small and full. Very quiet night. Next door there is a gas station and a Lidl supermarket. It is 15 minutes walking from the cathedral and main square. It is highly recommended.

title: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 512 Avenida Párroco Pablo Diez
title_short: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 512 Avenida Párroco Pablo Diez
description: Express laundromat in the mall Leclerc (open until 22h). Campsites cars can park in the car park no limit in height. No night parking allowed.

title: (24007) León - 86 Calle de la Serna
description: Cepsa gas station. carrefour express supermarket AC laundry room with ramp to go up and clean from above. Free drinking water load if you refuel. Propane and butane cylinders.

title: (24004) León - P.º Papalaguinda
description: Orange payment area.

title: (24006) León - 24 Calle Santo Tirso
description: Self-service laundry

title: (24006) León - 23 Calle Víctor de los Ríos
title_short: (24006) León - 23 Calle Víctor de los Ríos
description: Laundry

title: (24007) León - 9 Calle la Granja
description: Quiet parking near supermarket and gas station, 15 minutes from downtown. Eco-sanitary area and point for use by motorhomes and campers.

title: (24195) Villaquilambre - 3 Calle Valle Inclán
description: Parking in urbanized area, but not built, quiet and flat area, without services, 1km from the center of León, bars and supermarkets about 1 minute walk.

title: (24195) Villaquilambre - 13 Calle Paradiña
description: Very quiet parking in an urbanization on the outskirts of Leon. It has no service, only parking. Quieter than those in the area.

title: (24006) León - 3 Lugar Candamia
description: Car park on the outskirts of León next to the Candimia Park. We spent the night without any problem and at dawn we took a little walk with the kids through the park before visiting León where you can park in the motorhome area. there is a beach bar and a fountain with drinking water

title: (24195) Villaquilambre - 711 Lugar Villaobispo
description: Very quiet stretch of road just outside Leon, between residential areas. Many shady trees, only traffic is an occasional car and a few dogwalkers, bikers and joggers. There’s a bar at about 200 m, the only convenience. We stayed a very quiet night. No lights, no sounds.

title: (24005) León - 42 Arrabal San Madrid
description: Nice and quiet place 20 minutes walk from the cathedral. Ideal to spend the night

title: (24005) León - Unnamed Road
description: I camped here on September 22 at 12 degrees and in luxury, these mountains are a perfect place for camping

title: (24195) Villaquilambre - 731 Lugar Villaobispo
description:
Very nice and big 
place to eat, chill or sleep. Incredible panaroma view on Léon city. Although it seems to be a well known place (much trash unfortunately), it's still quiet and beautiful. Also great acces.

title: (24192) Trobajo del Cerecedo - S/N Calle Calvo Sotelo
title_short: (24192) Trobajo del Cerecedo - S/N Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Very quiet place day and night with shaded children's play area

title: (24005) León - Calle Isoba
description: Lots of opportunities to stand freely in this area. Access can sometimes be a challenge. Only with enough ground clearance, 4wd but not necessary. Let the tire pressure off if the surface is wet. Access currently only feasible from the south-west.

name: Camping Ciudad de León
title: (24227) Camping Ciudad de León
description: Camping León City

title: (24195) Golpejar de la Sobarriba - 24 Calle Real
title_short: (24195) Golpejar de la Sobarriba - 24 Calle Real
description: Large esplanade next to the town. without services but with a park with a water source next to it. very calm

name: Parking Area de León
title: (24391) Parking Area de León
description: A very quiet area to spend the night. It has everything you need for the motorhome (electricity, dirty water drain...) Carlos and Miguel are very attentive at all times. Small playground and outdoor dining area. One night with 2 adults and 2 girls 17 euros. We will definitely come back!

title: (24227) Valdefresno - 96 Carretera General
description: Repsol service station. Free water.

title: (24620) Cuadros - 22D Calle Real
description: New Motorhome Area, in Cuadros, near León, is already working, next to it there are public swimming pools, I have already spent the night there,

title: (24391) Valverde de la Virgen - Área de descanso
title_short: (24391) Valverde de la Virgen - Área de descanso
description: Right off the road with 2 picnic tables and some shade. To eat and sleep a little great.

title: (24620) Cuadros - 195 Calle Real
description: Place enabled with a concrete floor for the celebration of patron saint festivities. We have been sleeping 2 nights and without a problem, very quiet behind it there is a picnic area under some poplars and a soccer field that is open to the general public. We were in Area AC below but too much inclination. Nearby there is a Miami bar that is very good. It is worth discovering the roads and mountains of this municipality. Thank you, Marcos, mayor of the Cuadros town hall.

title: (24228) Valdefresno - 4 CL-624
description: This area is located in the car park of Mirador del Porma restaurant. on your arrival, go see Diego, he will place you. this area is free but by respect do not forget to have a drink or meal in the restaurant and everything will go very well. to date there are no additional services to empty and refuel.

title: (24226) Villarente -
description: Shaded parking/overnight area, small fountain and generally quite quiet at night. The ground is aligned.

title: (24251) Banuncias - 5T Calle Comercio
description: A place with trees where you can park the van in the shade in front of it there is a pool and a bar until 1 o'clock, music was played but a quiet place to spend the night.

title: (24226) Villarroane - 1T Carretera Villaturiel-Vr
description: Area with the possibility of parking at the entrance of the town, very quiet, there is a fountain where you can fill the water, there is NO emptying area, we use it to spend the night, and rest to continue the trip, little traffic. During the day there is some shade.

title: (24346) Vega de Infanzones - Calle la Fuente
title_short: (24346) Vega de Infanzones - Calle la Fuente
description: In front of an old mill abandoned at the end of a dirt road, 2 to 3 places to make a quiet stop or for one night.

title: (24219) Villasabariego - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit the caves. There was nothing going on, so I think staying overnight shouldn't be a problem. Access via gravel road, but is easy to drive.

title: (24640) La Robla - N-630
description: Recreational area little signposted between trees. NON-potable water source. Quiet place to spend the day or night without problems.

title: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
title_short: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
description: Cimanes del Tejar public park. Next to the Orbigo river. River beach, sports center, swimming pools, Las Cañas bar. Public toilets, no electricity, no water change.

title: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
title_short: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
description:
A place just a little further than the parking of the public recreational area.
Here you are located directly by the river, with perfect access to it. 
Perfect for those who like it a little bit more quiet. 
Suitable for one or at most two vans or smaller motorhomes. The ground is quite flat.
No services here, but you can use the facilities of the public area, which is only a 200 metres walk.

title: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 30 Calle la Barca
title_short: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 30 Calle la Barca
description: River pool with playground for children and sports fields. Very calm. Bar open in summer.

title: (24217) Mansilla Mayor - 1011 Avenida del Monasterio
description: Cistercian monastery of Sandoval being restored with possible parking in the courtyard of his old farm (ask politely to the guardian who very very kind !!) living in the house at the bottom of the grassy yard. An exceptional bivouac decor in this majestic semi restored decor! Ensuring a very calm night in a timeless atmosphere

title: (24820) Garrafe de Torío - 2 Camino Ermita
description: Peaceful sanctuary with picnic area, swings and fountain. the Hermitage is beautiful and there is enough space, although there are few leveled ones. Very quiet area and paved access.

title: (24392) Villar de Mazarife -
description: Grassy area next to a small pond, along the way to Santiago de Compostela with a drinking water point. No direct access to the grass by vehicle but access to the path which borders it and which therefore gives directly to the area. Very pleasant. Road with little traffic

title: (24217) Mansilla Mayor - 1006 Calle de Villaverde
description: Small picnic area with a table in the shade and rocked by the cow bells. At the edge of a road but little traffic. Trash available.

title: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 53 Calle Camping
title_short: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 53 Calle Camping
description: Recreation area with tennis court, mini golf, playgrounds, two bars .. right on the river with possibility of bath. Swimming pool with showers and toilets. Two small bars. Cheap beer

title: (24217) Mansilla Mayor - 1003 Calle de Villaverde
description: Small corner for lunch and rest. The road is very quiet. Trees provide shade.

title: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 17 Calle las Eras
title_short: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 17 Calle las Eras
description: Gray and black water emptying, city water filling

title: (24154) Vegas del Condado - 1025 Lugar S Cipriano
title_short: (24154) Vegas del Condado - 1025 Lugar S Cipriano
description: Good place for a stopover. with shade and a bit old swings. at the foot of a little traveled road. In general it is a fairly abandoned area, but pleasant.

name: Camping Camino de Santiago
title: (24392) Camping Camino de Santiago
description: Camping Camino de Santiago (2 *) It has a lot of shade, large plots and with water. It has a pool and 5 minutes walk from the town

title: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 50 Calle la Campaza
title_short: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 50 Calle la Campaza
description: Parking without services. Quiet night Very close to the municipal swimming pools and next to the river. Lots of shade, playground and good location for a walk around the city ...... highly recommended "strawberry and chocolate".

title: (24225) Campo de Villavidel - 9 Autovía Camino de Santiago
title_short: (24225) Campo de Villavidel - 9 Autovía Camino de Santiago
description: Rest area on the side of the road with a small restaurant and Repsol gas station, ideal for spending a night on the road

title: (24275) Rioseco de Tapia - 1 Avenida el Valle
title_short: (24275) Rioseco de Tapia - 1 Avenida el Valle
description: Very quiet and level parking area. It is in the center of town, where you can buy bread, bars / restaurants and a large sports area with a football and basketball field.

title: (24649) La Robla - Avenida Santa Lucía
description: Picnic area with sheltered tables and barbecue facilities. there is also a  water point. flat car park

title: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 3 Calle Muralla
title_short: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 3 Calle Muralla
description: Ample parking behind the wall, near the Ethnological Museum of León. It seems to be where the buses that come to visit the museum stop, but we have arrived on Saturday afternoon and there is no one here. Area without services but a few steps from the town center. Ideal for overnight

title: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas -
description: Quiet place. We slept, we bathed in the cool river, we went for a bike ride, nearby there are games for children…

title: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 12 Plaza Arrabal
title_short: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 12 Plaza Arrabal
description: Parking possible around the park.

title: (24640) La Robla - 7 Calle Alcalde José Benjamín Villalobos
title_short: (24640) La Robla - 7 Calle Alcalde José Benjamín Villalobos
description: Ramón hardware store. Supply of blue gas cylinders (small)

title: (24640) La Robla - 132 Carretera de Matallana
description: Quiet place near the road but without traffic.

title: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 39 Avenida Constitución
title_short: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 39 Avenida Constitución
description:
Very clean laundromat.
in cash or via app.
large car park opposite and gas station 50m away

title: (24820) Pedrún de Torío - 23 Avenida la Estación
title_short: (24820) Pedrún de Torío - 23 Avenida la Estación
description: La xana del torio musical tavern with private parking for the night, possibility of shower and breakfast, lunch and dinner

title: (24225) Villanueva de las Manzanas - 18 LE-512
description: The service station next to the Los Oteros motorway. There is a wide plunge for the truck, gas station, restaurant, shower ...

title: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 47-41 Avenida Constitución
title_short: (24210) Mansilla de las Mulas - 47-41 Avenida Constitución
description: Normal water tap for filling your water tank. We use for dishwashing and showers only. Right beside the diesel pumps at the petrol station.

title: (24640) La Robla - 25 Carretera la Magdalena
description: Self-service laundry from 8 am to 10 pm from Monday to Sunday.

title: (24640) La Robla - 46 Carretera el Rabizo
description: Parking of the sports center of La Robla. It has plenty of space to park, picnic (behind the pool), No need to adapt.

title: (24123) Carrocera - LE-420
description: Selga reservoir. Next to road and highway, but quiet. Small jetty area. With garbage and a small booth (if it rains). Somewhat left area, but perfect for picnic on pier.

title: (24648) La Robla - Calle El Calbo
description: Esplanade with water, swings and sports ground

title: (24230) Valdevimbre - 12 Travesía Calvo Sotelo
description: Village recreation area. Next to a small lake with ducks. Most of the tables are in the sun. Very quiet area. We haven't gotten to sleep but I don't think there would be a problem.

title: (24230) Valdevimbre - 7 Calle de Manuel Cadenas
description: Soccer field parking. Small town for gastronomic visit. Variety of restaurants located underground in what were once the wineries.

title: (24123) Carrocera - 27 Lugar Carrocera
description: Picnic area near the town of Carrocera, where there are tables to eat and a small fountain of drinking water. In which we can rest peacefully with space to park.

title: (24123) León - 1008 Lugar Santiago Villas
description:
Picnic area with two picnic areas between trees. A hose and a fountain. There is also a BBQ area.

There is no sign that prohibits or allows anything.

There is a shed with a plug and two spotlights available. The booth must be a toilet, but the door is closed (at least in spring, which is this date).

There is a small mobility area for older people and a swing for children.

title: (24123) Carrocera - 4 Calle de la Constitución
description: Playground with a place next to the main street. Super careful.

title: (24609) La Pola de Gordón - 1022 Barrio Buen Suceso
title_short: (24609) La Pola de Gordón - 1022 Barrio Buen Suceso
description: Picnic area near the road and next to a hermitage. With shade and tables. very nice to eat even sleep

title: (24839) Robles de la Valcueva - 18a Avenida León
title_short: (24839) Robles de la Valcueva - 18a Avenida León
description: Very good place with several places to bathe with shady pools and tables. Quiet and calm to spend the night

title: (24120) La Magdalena -
description: La Magdalena area and eco-sanitary point for the use of motorhomes and campers, very quiet, leveled next to the municipal swimming pools and the Luna river, there are shops and restaurants nearby and a very pleasant, spectacular views...Easy access by the entrance to the city after the building materials store, on the other side passage under a vaulted bridge sometimes difficult because of the parking area

title: (24233) Adanero - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (24233) Adanero - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Stop en route on the a66 off the road.

title: (24839) Matallana de Torío - 27 Avenida León
description: Land parking next to the hermitage. There is a picnic table. It is accessed by a very narrow dirt road, only for vans.

title: (24120) Soto y Amío - 2A Avenida la Magdalena
title_short: (24120) Soto y Amío - 2A Avenida la Magdalena
description: Stop on the road in a quiet village by the river and garden with wooden benches. You can take a short walk along the banks of the Luna river with information about birds, wildlife and vegetation. Safe place to sleep as there are houses, a pharmacy, a medical center, a bar-restaurant and a fountain.

title: (24920) La Aldea del Puente -
description: Formerly a beautifully landscaped park/rest area with a wonderful view. Space is now partly overgrown with small and larger shrubs, probably due to low use. Still usable. Garbage can down by the monastery. Some smaller trees planted at the edge that can provide shade in summer. The driveway to this place is about 100m to the left above the monastery and is quite steep. Well gravelled.

title: (24224) Cabreros del Río - 9T Calle D
description: Street cut with 10 free parking. It has barbecue area, fountain, public pool. In the village there is pharmacy, shop, tobacconist, playground ...

name: Campo Santa Marina del Rey
title: (24393) Campo Santa Marina del Rey
description:
Santa Marina del Rey, 21 Avenida Polideportivo.
Camping Ruviejo! Swimming pool, with mandatory bathing caps, free for campers (ask for the ticket at the campsite reception), entrance at the end of the shaded terrace of the bar. Attention opening reception of the campsite, closed between 2 p.m. and 4 p.m. Shaded pitches, clean and beautiful sanitary facilities, showers. Internet connection only at reception.

title: (24166) Gradefes - LE-5625
description: Small parking for visitors to the Pre-Romanesque church of San Miguel de Escalada, / -eben, no service, picnic area across the street, little busy side street, quiet, many swifts.

title: (24830) Barrio Estación - 4A Calle San Bartolomé
description: Parking of the municipal swimming pool. Freshly paved, sports court and bar. Sleeps well and few cars during the day outside of the pool season

name: Camping Bosque de Gordón S.L.
title: (24600) Camping Bosque de Gordón S.L.
description: Camping Bosque de Gordón SL

title: (24285) Quintanilla del Monte -
description: Small paved area next to the road. It has a water spout (without thread and with a very large pipe), a couple of picnic tables and a container.

title: (24120) Soto y Amío - CL-626
description: Nice and comfortable place next to the river. I slept one night. And the next morning I fished very early.

title: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 18D Calle Capitán Lozano
title_short: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 18D Calle Capitán Lozano
description: New motorhomes area, since the city of Pola has added this area to the existing one. . It does not have water service, which has to be done in the old one. Next to the river, not far from the railway line. Little unevenness, almost flat. Not paved. Good access.

title: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 23 Calle Luis Vives
title_short: (24600) La Pola de Gordón - 23 Calle Luis Vives
description: Located on N-630, 500m detour to enter La Pola de Gordon, free services, located in the center of town next to the river, green area, magnificent views, countless routes, civil war trenches, forests, 1600m mountains , etc. It has all the free services. There are few spaces but you can park along the paved river. There is another parking for motorhomes enabled on Calle Capitán Lozano.

title: (24123) Carrocera - 3 Calle Real
description: Small with a lot of charm and possibility of excursions and climbing. The access road is narrow but we have climbed without problems with a 7.8m long AC

title: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 8 Calle Magisterio Nacional
title_short: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 8 Calle Magisterio Nacional
description: Parking in Area with wooden tables and quiet, and central, and there is a cafeteria, Julian bar next door that opens at 7 in the morning and has a good breakfast and with the glasses you get skewers if you want at night you feel the wind and croak of the frogs ....

title: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 22H Calle Puente Piedra
title_short: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 22H Calle Puente Piedra
description: Next to sports facilities, very quiet, shadow, no services, 4G, bar nearby, next to the city and its services. Upstream there are many villages with "natural" pools, free, grass, picnic, shade.

title: (24149) Vega de Caballeros - CL-626
description: Nice and large resting room enough for 5 motorhomes at least. You can beneath the beautiful sight of the forests and mountains lying on the overside.

title: (24330) Santas Martas - 21 Calle Real
description: Small shaded grassy park with playground and bench ideal for taking a break with children and dog 2min from the motorway along the road that enters the very busy village.

title: (24330) Santas Martas - 1002 Lugar Santas Martas
description: Small area with 4 tables and a water point

title: (24650) Santa Lucía de Gordón - Unnamed Road
title_short: (24650) Santa Lucía de Gordón - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with tables and trees next to the river. The access is leaving the national road, crossing it below and after passing the train track to the left. Very quiet, I spent one night alone and only heard the train go by. Be careful, not suitable for tall vans or motorhomes, you pass a tunnel that does not reach 2.5m

title: (24930) Quintana de Rueda - 5016 Calle de la Era
title_short: (24930) Quintana de Rueda - 5016 Calle de la Era
description: Parking with lots of space at the end of the village, next to a sports center, picnic area and swimming pool, with drinking water. Little shade but very quiet to rest on a trip.

title: (24330) Santas Martas - 136 Calle Real
description: Parking place and quiet overnight, cafeteria, park, doctor's office and artisan sausage factory and butcher shop right next door (rich and cheap). We spent the night and filled the fridge with a lot of good.

title: (24286) Hospital de Órbigo - 4 Avenida Suero de Quiñones
title_short: (24286) Hospital de Órbigo - 4 Avenida Suero de Quiñones
description: Large parking lot with shade and recreational area where we were parked during the medieval festival of the Fair. Next to a restaurant and pools

name: Camping D Suero De Quiñones
title: (24286) Camping D Suero De Quiñones
description: Camping D Suero De Quiñones

title: (24836) - 2A Lugar Villalfeide
description: Esplanade next to the church, the town 3 minutes walk. If you like the mountain, you have the powdery peak, incredible views. There is also a greenway and the river right next to it. a marvel.

title: (24660) Ciñera - 591 Travesía Galicia
description: Day parking to do the Faedo de Ciñera route (for children) or to the Valporquero caves. Important: further on is the bus stop with a canopy. Do not park there. Nearby there is also a wide ticket to park but I do not advise going through the town because it has narrow streets. If you are going to spend the night, it is better to go to the Pola de Gordón Motorhome Area, approximately 8km away.

title: (24840) Valdepiélago - 34 Calle el Río
description: Picnic area with shadows and tables and nearby stream enabled for bathing. A bar with very friendly people, overnight allowed discreetly, they even left the ladies' toilet open to use it.

title: (24670) La Pola de Gordón - 32 Carretera la Vid
title_short: (24670) La Pola de Gordón - 32 Carretera la Vid
description: A beautiful place to stop to rest and even sleep surrounded by the magnificent landscape of the Vegacervera region. There are several groups of oak trees that shade at different times of the day. Nearby are the Vegacervera Gorges and Valporquero Caves. Don't forget to try the Coladilla village or  Vegacervera

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 2 LE-311
description: Picnic at the entrance to the town of Vegacervera, with an information office in the area. Hiking trails, Hoces de Vegacervera and indoor climbing wall and good restaurants. Goat cecina is eaten.

title: (24149) Mora de Luna -
description: Pretty abandoned picnic area with tables. shade, flat, calm, swim in a dammed river but water at 11.4° in July, poplars.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 8 LE-315
description: Esplanade with roundabout in the center of town. In mid-May we slept alone and very calm. Next to a repsol deposit. In a corner, in case buses came to turn around, although we didn't see any.

title: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 45J Avenida el Páramo
title_short: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 45J Avenida el Páramo
description: Great parking to spend day and night. On the banks of the Órbigo river with a shaded area, tables, park, sports area, municipal swimming pool, barbecues, public bathrooms ... etc. Fantastic bar Restaurant next door. A visit is recommended in summer to go down the river by canoe, with a local company, open pools and a beautiful river. Trout fishing area. Exceptional place. No emptying service.

name: La Cota
title: (24847) La Cota
description: Camping very quiet and family. The weight is very nice and the plots are very spacious. It has spectacular views and is a very suitable area to have many sports activities suitable for the whole Family.

title: (24160) Gradefes - 15 Calle el Sestil
description: Gradefes is a Spanish municipality and town in the province of León, in the autonomous community of Castilla y León. Monastery of Santa María de Gradefes, grove picnic area with tables. Available at the Day Center next to the area, menu to eat in the car or in the picnic area, prior request. This eco-sanitary area and point has been promoted by the Castilian and Leonese motorhome association. Hospitality services (bars and terraces), pharmacy, bazaar, tobacconist, “Ribera del Esla” Health Center, Unicaja (ATM), Civil Guard Post, Municipal Day Center (order menus and washing/ironing clothes ), recreational and sports area, healthy circuit, free fishing zone…. • Mountain bike routes • Hiking routes • Cycling routes • Mountain running routes • Cycle touring routes • Walking routes • Quad routes • Car routes THE ROUTE OF THE MONASTERIES 1. Santa María la Real de Gradefes Monastery (in Gradefes). 2. Monastery of San Miguel de Escalada (in San Miguel de Escalada). 3. Monastery of San Pedro de Eslonza (ruins) (in Santa Olaja de Eslonza). 4. Church of the Assumption in Villarmún (12th century). 5. Church of Our Lady in Rueda del Almirante. In areas and eco-sanitary points of the Community of Castilla y León you cannot take out tables, chairs, awnings and you cannot take out any camping elements.

name: Camping Las Hoces de Vegacervera
title: (24836) Camping Las Hoces de Vegacervera
description: Camping 600m from Vegacervera, very quiet, with very new and well-kept facilities. It has a cafeteria with mixed dishes and a menu of the day, they also offer the typical dish of the area, which would be goat cured meat. Perfect base of operations to visit the sickles or towns in the area such as Val Porquero and its cave, Pico Polvoreda along with the Valle del Marqués or the Faedo de Orzonaga among others. It has an active tourism company that offers speleo-canyoning in the Val Porquero cave or different nearby ferratas.

title: (24160) Gradefes - 7 Calle Campo
description: Large picnic area, near the Esla river, near the swimming pool and the sports fields of Gradefes. It has barbecue and spaces with shadows. Drinking water a few meters away and supermarket nearby. Monastery of the XI Century.

title: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 8 Calle Doctor Basilio López
title_short: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 8 Calle Doctor Basilio López
description: Parking in the urban area, next to a park and the town center, with supermarkets, restaurants, etc. Next to it passes a train track with little night traffic. You can spend the night without problems. On Friday mornings there is a market in the center of town and this is the car park that people use that day. It is a town with atmosphere in summer and various activities.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 36 LE-315
description: Excellent enclave in the gorge. Without services and with a river and mountains nearby. Please do not leave trash or toilet paper.

title: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 7 Avenida de Asturias
title_short: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 7 Avenida de Asturias
description: Ample parking for the supermarket, places with no height limit.

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 35 LE-315
description: Good place next to the river.

title_short: (24397) Quintana del Castillo - 24 Calle la Peña
description:
Beautiful view point :)
Here are benches, a rubbish bin and even a water tap :)

Good spot for a break ;)

title: (24837) Vegacervera - Carretera de Valporquero de Torio a Felmín
title_short: (24837) Vegacervera - Carretera de Valporquero de Torio a Felmín
description: Parking to visit the caves. It is possible to spend the night. Without filling or emptying services. Nice place between the mountains. Restaurant in the area, or 1 km in the village. Visit the caves, the belvedere, the hiking trail.

address.street: Carretera de Valporquero de Torio a Felmín

title: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 12 Calle la Canal
title_short: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 12 Calle la Canal
description: Parking on Calle12 street. Water. Drain. Toilet. Sports Center. Municipal pool and spa. Dominical market so street turns into market. Closed on Mondays

title: (24847) Valdepiélago - 13A Avenida Jaime Lobo Asenjo
description: Wide jacket next to the river. It is possible to park in the shade for most of the day. Very quiet and pleasant site with access to the river.

title: (24288) Santibáñez de Valdeiglesias - 24 Lugar Santiba/ez Vald
title_short: (24288) Santibáñez de Valdeiglesias - 24 Lugar Santiba/ez Vald
description: Day-night parking on the Camino de Santiago Frances, with drinking water, but without emptying area, illuminated area. Very calm. Its use is prohibited at parties, since it is the venue for them. The baker passes by at noon with his van. Soon I will upload photos of the area. Pleasant walk to the upper town, Valdeiglesias, to see the beautiful Jardín del Brujo and enjoy the good water from its fountain. Area to enjoy good mountain bike routes.

title: (24161) Sahechores -
description:
Motorhome parking in a magical place on the shores of a lake.

There is a local produce shop, restaurant and bar, water activities on the lake (kayak, pedal boats, paddle surf etc)

title: (24836) Vegacervera - 3A Lugar Valporquero Tor
description: Watchtower. You can stop and stay overnight without problems. Near the village. Spectacular views. If you like the mountain visit this town. Do not forget to visit the Cave. There are no services, but you will sleep almost in heaven. Very quiet town.

title: (24847) Valdepiélago - 3A Calle el Puente
description: Free, quiet parking area parallel to the main road. Several parking spaces, on asphalt or cement. Public fountain and trash containers next door. Also a medieval bridge over the Curueño river.

title: (24161) Cubillas de Rueda - Calle Carretera
description: 150m from the road is a picnic bench located directly on a lake. Wonderfully quiet. There is the possibility to sleep, because some places are not visible from the street.

title: (24356) Villazala - 1014 Lugar San Pelayo
description: Give us a very quiet night completely alone. Very pleasant environment on the banks of the Orbigo River and with a great river poscina. During the day in the summer months it is full of people, especially on weekends. Eye!. Do not follow the directions of Google GPS. It takes you to the opposite side of the river and there is no access. To get there you have to reach the village of Villoria de Orbigo and cross it. There are some indicative signs, but they are not very clear. When in doubt better ask.

title: (24234) Villamañán - CL-621
description: Gas station with highly recommended restaurant, home cooking and rich

title: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - 18B Calle Real
title_short: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - 18B Calle Real
description: Asphalt parking, flat, no services, very quiet place with the marsh dam next door and hiking trails. ATTENTION, if you arrive by the marshy part, do not enter the first entrance, there is a VERY narrow street. Go down to the end and take the main entrance

title: (24846) Valdepiélago - 1A Lugar Montuerto
description: River beach with good access. The bathrooms are closed, but it seems that in summer they set up a beach bar. Great for spending the night by the river, springboard for the Nocedo waterfalls.

name: Las Cuevas
title: (24846) Las Cuevas
description: Super nice quiet campsite on a river where you can cool off. The campsite has a chiringuito a little further away, with tapas/sandwiches. Many beautiful hiking trails can be reached from the campsite. The campsite can be reached by very narrow roads, with a fiat Ducato L3H3 this worked fine, but beware if you are taller (wider!). A baker comes by 1 x a day (note the horn) with sandwiches and goodies

title: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - 10 CL-626
description: Place with beautiful views. We were quietly eating and spending the afternoon without any problem. There is no passing cars or anything.

title: (24846) Nocedo de Curueño -

title: (24850) Boñar - 32 Avenida de la Constitución
description: We parked on the roadside, online. We spent the night and no problem. Close to shops, banks, supermarkets etc. Almost in the center of the city. The GC has gone several times and has not said anything. We stopped here because in the air-conditioned area it was just us and it gave me a lot of insecurity on those dates. We loaded and unloaded in the area, yes.

name: Área de autocaravanas | Camping El Soto
title: (24850) Área de autocaravanas | Camping El Soto
title_short: (24850) Área de autocaravanas | Camping El Soto
description: The pitch is integrated into the campsite, the price includes all services except electricity. As in all areas, you cannot take out tables or awnings or eat outside. The campsite is monitored 24 hours a day. Right next to it is the municipal swimming pool, which is gigantic. When entering the campsite, indicate that you are heading towards the RV area.

title: (24608) La Pola de Gordón - LE-473

title: (24850) Boñar - 2 Calle Escuelas

name: Camping El Soto

title: (24680) Villamanín - 12 Carretera Asturias

title_short: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - Carretera Villamañán

Behind the large sports complex you can stop under the works or at the water's edge. Quiet place to rock to the sound of the water with picnic tables and barbecue. Right next to it, a path for walking or cycling takes you to the center of the city. The road is passable and narrow, ideal for converted vans.

title: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - Pl. Maestro Pastrana
title_short: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - Pl. Maestro Pastrana

title: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - CL-621

In the town (Valencia de Don Juan) there is a nice recently renovated area that although it has no shade at the moment since the trees are still young, it is located in a nice spot and close to everything. The town is worth visiting. Cinema, Super, Gas station, Workshops, Shops. THURSDAY market, ETC.

title: (24148) Mallo de Luna -
description: Nice spot with a superb view of the lake. Quiet and protected by a few shrubs. Access is quite easy by stone and dirt path for a van type vehicle. the land has a few flat areas to land quietly and spend the night. Next to it is a small, very quiet cove on the lake.

title: (24680) Villamanín - 98 N-630
description: Parking of the roadside hostel, friendly treatment, you can have lunch and dinner, in the morning they open at 7, to spend one night,

title: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - CL-621
description: DAY ONLY car park, ideal for public outdoor swimming pools in Valencia Don Juan. It is actually like an aquapark but much cheaper as it is municipal. 100% recommended visit. restaurants paddle tennis soccer basketball ping pong and many swimming pools with tubes to jump into. After the day A RECENTLY REFURBISHED AREA in the same town, very close to this point and with a pleasant environment, close to everything. Locality worth visiting. It has everything (Cinema, Supermarkets, Workshops, gas station, lots of tapas in bars, etc...)

title: () Vegaquemada - Unnamed Road

title: (24147) Los Barrios de Luna - 53 CL-626
description: On the banks of the Barrio de Luna Reservoir, you enter from the highway, it is a dirt road made by cars and with pebbles, which makes transit much easier.  At the beginning there are bushes and a couple of trees and the road is narrow. But it is worth it. In the middle of winter I do not know if it is a good idea, because this area is snowy and the same is a mud. It is very pleasant and a very splendid air runs.

title: (24838) Cármenes - LE-312
description: Alto de Cármenes with spectacular views of dusk and dawn. Without services Very calm.

title: (24688) Villamanín - Barrio Triana
description: An excellent place to spend the day next to the Casares reservoir, after completing the excellent Via Ferrata de flores and Arbas Valley lagoon. It is accessed by paved road, although it does not appear on Google Maps.

title_short: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - 10 Avenida de Mayorga

title_short: (24710) San Justo de la Vega - 21B Carretera Astorga

name: Area de autocaravanas Valencia de Don Juan
title: (24200) Area de autocaravanas Valencia de Don Juan
title_short: (24200) Area de autocaravanas Valencia de Don Juan
description: Free area, near the town. Next to soccer field, school, heated pool, paddle tennis courts and sports hall. Ideal for sleeping and resting in a quiet place. A town with a lot of atmosphere, shops, supermarkets, banks and a GREAT recreational pool area with slides and games in summer. Two emptying and filling zones. Only motorhomes and camper. Two nearby campsites for caravans. THURSDAY market in the square. Workshops, restaurants, banks, shops of all kinds in the town and very close to the area. MITLE Museum, Garden of the Ducks and Esla viewpoint next to the castle, Church of San Pedro, Casa del Gaudí Coyantino. February agricultural machinery fair. In summer with fairs and activities many weekends. Patron Saint Festivities in September.

title: (24397) Donillas - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful. Wonderfully calm. Great view of the lake. We're standing. We stayed 2 days (midweek). Also paradise for dogs. All happy :-)

title: (24838) Cármenes - 28A Calle Demetrio Lopez Aller
description: Area with all services (new opening in June 2019), Village at 1330 meters above sea level with 400 inhabitants, near Cueva de Vallporquero, Hoces de Pontedo and Hoces de Vegacervera. Motorhomes up to 9 meters can enter through the door. Only Movistar mobile coverage. Area only for the use of motorhomes and camper. This area has the support of the Castellana y Leonesa de Autocaravanistas association, a representative association of motorhomes in Castilla y León, Only motorhomes and camper

title: (24397) Quintana del Castillo - LE-450
description: Swamp surrounded by forest with chiringuitos and pedal boats for rent, ideal for swimming and sleeping

Quite a discovery!

title: (24146) Caldas de Luna - s/n A-66
description: Paved parking just 30 meters from the Caldas de Luna spa, a restaurant and some houses a little far from the town. The location is right at the beginning of the Las Brañas de Caldas route. Slightly uneven. It is not necessary to enter the narrow streets of Caldas, it is enough to turn off following the indications to the spa that appear less than 1 km from the entrance to the town and that runs almost parallel to the highway, which is very close but is not heard during the night. Surrounded by mountains and next to an inaccessible stream.

name: Puente Paulón
title: (24763) Puente Paulón
description: River beach next to La Bañeza, with a beach bar and grills, perfect for sleeping peacefully and taking a bath in the Orbigo River.

title: (24845) Tolibia de Abajo -
description: Amazing place, spacious, quiet and easily accessible. It is very large and is sheltered between trees and the slopes of the mountain. It is accessed by the path that I indicate in the photo. if you cross the small stream there is even more space and more hidden. Well leveled for the most part.

title: (24700) Astorga - 15 Plaza Santo Domingo
description: Public parking with about 30 spaces, next to a small church, quite empty, ideal for visiting the cathedral and Gaudí's palace, which are 5 min.

title: (24854) Boñar - LE-331
description: Recreational area, flat parking, then grassy area behind the gates, the river is next, it's in the middle of the forest. The path is narrow and a little hole but it does, a few branches across.

title: (24700) Astorga - 43 Calle Alcalde Carro Verdejo
description: Large gravel parking lot, illuminated. A billboard with truck driving ban. Very quiet only a few residents park in this square, also very quiet at night. Sights almost in sight.

title: (24700) Astorga - 23 Avenida las Murallas
description: Public parking, right next to the cathedral, a few meters away. Attention! It is a flooded area, so it is recommended not to park in the rainy season. there is a sign indicating it.
